title: A Long, Hot, Delicious Slide
description: Cooper Merrick's life could not be better. After divorcing his wife, Gilly, he falls into a casual affair with her tennis coach, Troy. However, he discovers his best friend is really a Fae from another realm. After discovering his father is gay, he decides to leave this world and go to OtheWorld with his fae lover.
author: H.C. Brown
